title: Awarding the contract for providing the consultancy services for the supervision of  the project for the re-construction of 25 bridges
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Kabir Hashim, the Minister of Highways & Road Development, to award the contract for providing consultancy services for  the construction supervision of contract package 02 pertaining to the Project for the Reconstruction of 25 Bridges funded by the Kuwait Fund for Arab Economic Development (KFAED), to Dr. Nabeel Abdul-Raheem Consultants (NARCO) Joint Venture formed with the Resources Development Consultants (Pvt.) Ltd., for a sum of Kuwait Dinar 118,440 and Rs.169.2 million, as recommended by the Cabinet Appointed Consultants Procurement Committee (CPCC), was approved by the Cabinet.
